title: Outdoor Fireplace, Pool with Spa/Hot Tub
posting_body: ['Want more information?', 'Follow this link:', '<URL>', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 45', 'OR Text', '45', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text us.', 'Modern Living', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1087 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Welcome to your new home, where history and modern style fuse to create the ideal living atmosphere.', 'Here, people are linked not just by rail, but by the energetic pulse of local community life.', 'Our apartments are a well-connected living hub nestled in the heart of Colorado’s most eclectic metropolitan paradise.', 'Everywhere you turn, you’re surrounded by the best food, history, and street tunes that Denver has to offer.', 'You’ve found your cool, accessible, and unique downtown Denver apartment home.', 'Features', '- Modern Brushed-Nickel Interior Finishes', '- Conveniently pre-wired for high-speed data/phone/cable', '- California Style, Walk-in Closets', '- Built-in speakers with Bluetooth Capability*', '- Fireplace*', '- Glass Panel Walk-in Showers*', '- Relaxing Soaking Tubs*', '- Pendant Lighting in Kitchen', '- Wood Plank Flooring in Kitchen & Living Areas*', '- Kitchen Pantry', '- Built-in Computer Desks with Bookshelves*', '- Individual Climate Control with Energy Saving Programmable Thermostats', '- Ceiling Fans', '- Kitchen Island with built-in range and breakfast bar seating*', '- Washer/Dryer in Homes', '- Courtyard View*', '- Washer/Dryer in homes', '- Glass & Marble Mosaic Tile Backsplash in Kitchen', '- Stainless Steel G.E. Appliances Including Microwave & Refrigerator w/ Ice-maker', '- Spacious Exterior Patios*', '*In select apartment homes.', 'Community Amenities', '- Private Roof Top Deck with a Fire Pit and Kitchen Area', '- Courtyard', '- Bike Racks', '- Garage', '- Outdoor Fireplace', '- Dog Park with Dog Run', '- Green Building Design slated for LEED GOLD Certification', '- Business Center', '- Watch our WRS Pet Video', '- Controlled Access/Gated', '- 24 Hour Fitness center featuring Techno Gym equipment with iPod docking station', '- Wine Cellar', '- Onsite Dog Wash', '- Storage Available', '- Bike Shop', '- Clubhouse', '- Grilling Stations', '- Pool with Spa/Hot Tub', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday:10:00AM-6:00PM', 'Saturday:10:00AM-5:00PM', 'Sunday:1:00PM-5:00PM', 'Pet Policy', 'We allow up to 3 pets with a combined weight limit of 150 lbs, with breed restrictions.', 'Pet rent is $35/month per pet, and pet fee is $400 for the 1st pet, $100 for each additional.', 'xaU63Kzh']
